targets.rawSql:
WITH base as (
SELECT 
  timestamp as time, 
  balance0 / 1e18 as balance0, 
  balance1 / 1e18 as balance1, 
  ((balance0 / 1e18) + (balance1 / 1e18)) as total
FROM curve_pool_balance
where address = '0x94b17476a93b3262d87b9a326965d1e91f9c13e7'
order by time
)

select 
  time,
  balance0,
  balance1,
  balance0 / nullif(total, 0) as balance0_p,
  balance1 / nullif(total, 0) as balance1_p
from base

WITH base as (
SELECT 
  timestamp as time, 
  balance0 / 1e18 as balance0, 
  balance1 / 1e18 as balance1, 
  balance2 / 1e18 as balance2, 
  ((balance0 / 1e18) + (balance1 / 1e18) + (balance2 / 1e18)) as total
FROM curve_pool_balance
where address = '0x2570f1bd5d2735314fc102eb12fc1afe9e6e7193'

  balance2 / nullif(total, 0) as balance2_p
from base
